## Protocol.Runtime.SetAsyncCallStackDepthRequest interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SetAsyncCallStackDepthRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxDepth](./puppeteer.protocol.runtime.setasynccallstackdepthrequest.maxdepth.md) | [integer](./puppeteer.protocol.integer.md) | Maximum depth of async call stacks. Setting to <code>0</code> will effectively disable collecting async call stacks (default). |
